#include <stdio.h>

#ifndef ONLINE_JUDGE
#define gc() getchar()
#define pc(a) putchar(a)
#else
#define gc() getchar_unlocked()
#define pc(a) putchar_unlocked(a)
#endif

inline void fastRead(long long *a)
{
	register int c=0,d=0;
	while (c<33)
	{
		c=gc();
	}
	*a=0;
	while (c>33)
	{
		*a = (*a<<1)+(*a<<3)+c-48;
		c=gc();
	}
	if( d )
	{
		*a = -(*a);
	}
}
inline void fastWrite(long long a)
{
	char snum[20];
	int i=0;
	do
	{
		snum[i++]=a%10+48;
		a=a/10;
	}while(a!=0);
	--i;
	while(i>=0)
	pc(snum[i--]);
}

int main()
{
    int t=1;
    while(t--)
	{
	    long long N;
        fastRead(&N);
        const long long mod = 1000000007;
        if(N&1)
            N -= 13;
        else
            N -= 14;
        if(N<0)
        {
            fastWrite(0);
            //return 0;
            printf("\n");
            continue;
        }
        if(N==0)
        {
            fastWrite(1);
            //return 0;
            printf("\n");
            continue;
        }
        N = N/2 + 6;
        //Reduced to beggar Problem with 7 beggars --> (N+6)C6

        //Factors of 6!
        int pow2 = 4;
        int pow3 = 2;
        int pow5 = 1;

        long long P = 1;
        int i = 0;
        long long n;
        for (i = 0; i < 6; ++i)					//Calculating (N+6)C6
        {
            n = N--;
            while(pow2 && (n&1)==0)
            {
                n = n>>1;	// =n/2
                --pow2;
            }
            while(pow3 && n%3==0)
            {
                n /= 3;
                --pow3;
            }
            if(pow5 && n%5==0)
            {
                n/=5;
                pow5=0;
            }
            P = (P*n) % mod;
        }
        fastWrite(P);
        printf("\n");
	}
	return 0;
}
